posts.title: Dyson Cyclone V10 Cordless Vacuum
posts.content: If you’re searching for power, versatility, and portability then you need the Dyson Cyclone V10 cordless vacuum! Weighing just 125 grams, this lightweight vac efficiently sucks up both large debris and fine dust and works equally well on both carpets and hardwood floors.

posts.title: Epic Artisanal Pork Rinds
posts.content: Level up your snaking by trading in those gas station treats for some Epic artisanal pork rinds. These high protein paleo-friendly snacks are made using pastured, organic, and certified humane pork that’s available in three varieties – sea salt pepper, bbq, and maple bacon.

posts.title: Personal Towel Warmer
posts.content: Ensure your towel is always nice and toasty by storing it inside this personal towel warmer. This device is compact enough to fit discreetly in any bathroom counter top and is large enough to heat two full size towels at once.

posts.title: Transformable Multicart
posts.content: Move huge amounts of equipment without needing a variety of dollies and hand trucks by using this transformable multicart. It features a powder coated steel tube frame and can be instantly transformed into 1 of 8 distinct functional configurations.

posts.title: LEGO Digital Camera
posts.content: Teach your offspring the joys of photography from an early age with the LEGO digital camera. This unique 3 mega pixel camera holds up to 80 photos, comes with a built in flash and features a vibrant LEGO brick frame designed to make photography fun for everyone.

posts.title: The Indestructible Emergency Light
posts.content: When the power fails, the indestructible emergency light will ensure you’re never left in the dark. Great for both civilian and military applications, this reusable light comes in a high-impact container that can handle any environment and provides up to 30 hours of light.

posts.title: Shark Wall Projector
posts.content: Experience the up close encounter you’ve always been too afraid to try in real life with the shark wall projector. The projector easily mounts onto the wall and creates a jaw dropping image of a great white you can actually touch without losing a limb.

posts.title: Modern Boxed Wine Dispenser
posts.content: Keep your favorite fermented grape juice fresh long after you open it by placing it inside this modern boxed wine dispenser. It’s capable of holding three liters and is designed to keep wine fresh for up to six weeks after you pour your first glass.

posts.title: Hairclip Multi-Tool
posts.content: If MacGyver had a vagina, he/she would undoubtedly own one of these hairclip multi-tools. Traditionally used by alpha females to mark their territory in their spouse’s domicile, this hair clip functions as a screwdriver, wrench, ruler and even a cutting edge!

posts.title: Portable Clothes Washer
posts.content: Keep your garments looking and smelling clean when there’s no laundromat in sight by using this portable clothes washer. You simply fill this 6-liter capacity waterproof bag up with water, detergent, dirty clothes, and shake vigorously for 1 to 2 minutes.

posts.title: Victorinox Swiss Champ Xavt
posts.content: Carry a drawer’s worth of useful tools without weighing yourself down by getting your hands on the Victorinox Swiss Champ Xavt. It features a superb stainless steel construction, an array of helpful tools, and is complemented by a small side mounted digital watch.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Hair Gel
posts.content: Stand apart from the crowd by accenting your party getup with some glow in the dark hair gel. Available in green, yellow, blue, and pink, this eccentric gel is easy to apply and made to glow under UV lighting so your hair really pops.
